aspects.name: service quality

related_reviews.review_text: Nightingale is consistently excellent.....the food is superb, the service is wonderful, the ambience is lovely and all three categories can be depended on. It is a treat to go there!
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Nightingale is consistently excellent.....the food is superb, the service is wonderful, the ambience is lovely and all three categories can be depended on. It is a treat to go there!

related_reviews.review_text: We had lunch with my husband in the Nightingale. It was nothing but amazing experience. Food quality, freshness and presentation were 5 stars I also ordered a local BC cider and wow ü§© such a clean beautiful bubbly drink. Our server Caesar was very attentive. Everything was perfect in Nightingale and the interior is very welcoming and relaxing. I highly recommend to eat there if you happen to be in Downtown Vancouver

related_reviews.review_text: We went here for the first time for my wife‚Äôs birthday. The service was outstanding with Oscar providing recommendations at our request and timing our dishes with impeccable taste. The atmosphere was lively but we had a table that was private and quiet enough to allow us to enjoy our evening while feeling a part of the action. The decor was tasteful and catchy. Finally the food was delicious but very healthy. Dessert have the salted caramel cup! Highly recommend!

related_reviews.review_text: Very unique menu and dining style. Helpful friendly staff at a levels.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Very unique menu and dining style. Helpful friendly staff at a levels.

related_reviews.review_text: Four of us had a late lunch over the weekend and everything was fantastic. I do not recall our servers name. She was engaging and her service was excellent. I have been to Nightingale only twice and both times the food was on point combined with a great experience so I will be back. Thank you, Bruce Shaver
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Four of us had a late lunch over the weekend and everything was fantastic. I do not recall our servers name. She was engaging and her service was excellent. I have been to Nightingale only twice and b

related_reviews.review_text: I booked a table for six at Nightingale for my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday, and unfortunately this visit fell short of the service standard I‚Äôve come to expect here. One of our friends arrived first, and instead of seating her or at least welcoming her to wait at the table, the hostess questioned whether all six people were still coming. Since she wasn‚Äôt the one who made the reservation, she didn‚Äôt know, and because of that, they refused to seat her until the rest of us arrived. It felt odd and unaccommodating. The entire purpose of making a reservation is to ensure you have a table, so it was surprising that they wouldn‚Äôt let one member of the party be seated. What made the situation even more uncomfortable was that after refusing to seat her, the two staff members at the host stand began speaking to each other in another language about the situation, which came across as unprofessional and dismissive. The second issue happened at the end of the evening while we were paying. We explained...
related_reviews.sentiment_context: I booked a table for six at Nightingale for my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday, and unfortunately this visit fell short of the service standard I‚Äôve come to expect here. One of our friends arrived first, and in

related_reviews.review_text: Pricy for size of servings and unexpected amount of bones in a deboned butterflied fish dish. Tasty Asian flavoured brussels sprouts. Matcha opera cake was ok, barely taste the matcha. All around friendly, attentive service. The 2 of us shared a Roasted whole branzino, chimichurri, charred lemon ($46); a Roasted brussels sprouts, green onion, thai chili vinaigrette )$18). Although both of us are considered small eaters, these dishes might be just enough for one. Looking around nearby tables, I‚Äôd say that applies to many of the ‚Äòlarge‚Äô dishes. Treat them as appies.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Pricy for size of servings and unexpected amount of bones in a deboned butterflied fish dish. Tasty Asian flavoured brussels sprouts. Matcha opera cake was ok, barely taste the matcha. All around frie

related_reviews.review_text: We are a group of 8 girl friends who meet annually to celebrate the year around the holiday season. For most of us it was our first time at Nightingale. We were there for lunch and the place was packed. They gave us a nice big table so had enough space for us all ! Our server Remy was very good and detail oriented. She gave us the information required, provided excellent service. Everything we ordered was delicious and they all thanked me for choosing this location for our get together. The noise level initially was loud but quietened down after a while. Overall we had an amazing time !
related_reviews.sentiment_context: We are a group of 8 girl friends who meet annually to celebrate the year around the holiday season. For most of us it was our first time at Nightingale. We were there for lunch and the place was packe

aspects.summary: Customers consistently praise Nightingale's service quality, describing it as outstanding, excellent, and dependable across multiple visits. Staff members like Oscar and Megan receive specific recognition for their attentiveness, timing, and ability to provide helpful recommendations while understanding business lunch needs. While most experiences are highly positive, there was one instance where service fell short of expected standards during a birthday celebration.

aspects.name: food quality

related_reviews.review_text: First off, the ambiance? Incredible. The second you walk in, it‚Äôs got that warm, inviting vibe that makes you feel like you‚Äôve been there a dozen times already. Cozy lighting, great energy, music on point ‚Äî just exceptional all the way around. Now‚Ä¶ the meatball. Listen. I wasn‚Äôt ready. This was one of those meatballs where you take one bite and immediately look around the room like, ‚ÄúDid anyone else just taste that?!‚Äù Just amazing. Overall, 10/10. Loved the spot, loved the vibe, loved the food ‚Äî I honestly can‚Äôt wait to come back. Canada, you did not disappoint.

related_reviews.review_text: Not my first visit here, and definitely not my last. I keep coming back because I truly love the Nightingale experience. Everything makes it special ‚Äî the beautiful d√©cor, warm ambiance, attentive service, and of course, the absolutely finger-licking-good dishes. P.S. My last visit was on par with all the others. My only wish is for the music volume to be just a touch lower so conversations can flow as effortlessly as the food does. After all, great dining is best enjoyed with great company.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Not my first visit here, and definitely not my last. I keep coming back because I truly love the Nightingale experience. Everything makes it special ‚Äî the beautiful d√©cor, warm ambiance, attentive ser

related_reviews.review_text: We were really impressed with the service from the get-go and the lively ambience. The way the food plates are shared was a refreshing way to approach dinner. The food was outstanding. We were especially impressed with the woodfired pizza and the beat salad. Our only suggestion would be to include a bit more substance on the braised ribs.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: We were really impressed with the service from the get-go and the lively ambience. The way the food plates are shared was a refreshing way to approach dinner. The food was outstanding. We were especia

related_reviews.review_text: Food was spot on and the server was awesome. We really enjoyed our meal and experience. A favourite place to go for sure.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Food was spot on and the server was awesome. We really enjoyed our meal and experience. A favourite place to go for sure.

related_reviews.review_text: Every bite was fantastic, with great drinks (both cocktails and mocktails) to wash them down. The family style eating ensures a wealth of different flavour combinations, and I am eager to return to try more. Not a complaint, but it was almost too loud to hear the server or each other while eating - just something to consider if you're hoping for a quieter night out. The sweet potato, brick pressed chicken, and short rib were our personal favourites.
related_reviews.sentiment_context: Every bite was fantastic, with great drinks (both cocktails and mocktails) to wash them down. The family style eating ensures a wealth of different flavour combinations, and I am eager to return to tr

aspects.summary: Food quality receives exceptional praise from customers, with multiple reviews describing it as superb, fantastic, and consistently excellent across visits. Customers specifically highlight the outstanding taste, freshness, and 5-star presentation of dishes, with many expressing eagerness to return. The food quality is cited as a key reason for customer loyalty and repeat visits.

aspects.summary: Customer feedback on noise levels is mixed, with some guests noting challenges in conversation during busy periods. The restaurant can become quite packed during peak times like lunch service, which appears to impact the acoustic environment. This seems to be more of a concern for larger groups trying to have conversations.

aspects.name: seating comfort

related_reviews.review_text: First, I want to say that I‚Äôm a big fan of Nightingale. Every time I‚Äôm in Vancouver, I try to fit in a dinner at your restaurant. The food and the staff are always excellent. It‚Äôs consistently a great experience. In the past, I‚Äôve usually had a table on the patio, the first floor, or at the bar, and all of those were wonderful. However, my recent experience on the second floor at a small table facing the kitchen was noticeably less positive. The ventilation in that area doesn‚Äôt seem strong enough, and our clothes and skin absorbed a lot of the kitchen fumes. Sitting side by side also made it a bit awkward to have a conversation with my colleague. If this had been my first experience at Nightingale, I‚Äôm not sure I would have come back in the future.

One customer specifically noted that servings felt insufficient for the cost, though others seem satisfied with the sharing plate format. This appears to be a value perception issue rather than a universal complaint.
